narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Randi Drummond is a Counselor, Addiction (Substance Use Disorder) provider based in Coal Grove, OH. From 2024-01 through 2024-07, this provider received $89K in Medicaid payments across 1K claims serving 243 beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 1.9× the national median for H0006 (H0006), at $81 per claim vs. the median of $43, placing them above the 75th percentile.
97% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: H0006 (H0006). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
